notes.text:
This update for dnsmasq fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2015-8899: Denial of service between local and remote dns entries (bsc#983273)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Dnsmasq before 2.76 allows remote servers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a reply with an empty DNS address that has an (1) A or (2) AAAA record defined locally.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
